article.para: &RELEASE; is the initial release of the &COMPANYABBR; technology services, education dashboards, and documentation.

With this release, &COMPANYABBR; provides application developers with access to a sandbox &COMPANYABBR; environment and a series of dedicated developer camps taking place over the next several months [[[FIXME: link "developer camps" to the corresponding URL for info]]]. While accessing their sandbox, developers can ingest &COMPANYABBR; sample data sets, sign in as different users with varying roles, and create new applications that interact with the data using the &COMPANYABBR; REST API. These applications can perform the same tasks available to state and district tenants.

REMINDER: The Sandbox MUST NOT contain actual student data. Users should load only artificial or fabricated data into the sandbox. The &COMPANYABBR; provides sample fabricated data sets available for download from the Sandbox Developer Web Site at http://dev.slcedu.org/getting-started/sandbox/.

section.title: What's in this release?
section.para: For more information about what's in this release, see SLC Alpha Environment: Alpha Release Scope & Timeline

section.title: Web Browser Compatibility
section.para: &COMPANYABBR; educator dashboard is best viewed in Internet Explore 8+, Firefox 6+, Safari 4+ with 1024x768 as the minimum recommended screen resolution.
